summary: This document is an email communication from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, discussing confidential information. The email emphasizes the confidentiality and potential attorney-client privilege of the content, warning against unauthorized use or disclosure.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating the communication is confidential and potentially privileged.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which is directed to him regarding confidential matters.

connections.description: The email suggests a relationship where Epstein is communicating confidential information to Staley, potentially indicating an attorney-client relationship.

keyFacts: The email is marked as confidential and may contain attorney-client privileged information.
It warns against unauthorized use, disclosure, or copying of the communication.
The email was sent from Jeffrey Epstein's email address to Jes Staley.
